chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
<speak>
    <break time="500ms"/>    <s>Augustine.</s>
    <s>Blessed Augustine gives us a brief lesson on how those in authority should handle wicked people, saying:</s>
<break time="1s"/>
</speak>
chunks.original_latin:
VII. Augustinus. Beatus docet breviter Augustinus qualiter eis qui
praesunt de quibuscunque hominibus pravis agendum
sit, dicens:

chunks.cleaned_english_translation: Augustine. Blessed Augustine gives us a brief lesson on how those in authority should handle wicked people, saying: "We shouldn't lose hope in the wicked. Instead, we should pray more earnestly for them to become good, because the number of saints has always grown from the ranks of the impious."
chunks.original_latin:
Non est desperandum de malis, sed pro ipsis ut
boni fiant studiosius supplicandum, quia numerus
sanctorum de numero semper auctus est impiorum.
